unnormalised: mhojekoṇāṇī vaidyakīyavṛttīntūṇ vapṭelīṃ māpanācīṃ ēkamakāṃīṃ kasalīṃ mhūṇ prasna kelo, mhūṇ hañva kaim̃ saṃmānnya udaharaṇāṃīṃ vāṭṭīṃ gēlo mhūṇ bhāvelāṃ. tēṃ ēkaṃ khūba vegavēgīḷa ksētra asa! dhrava aurṣadhāṃsātīra, vastū āpōpa mL (millilitara) mēḷa vapṭelīṃ jatat. udāharaṇāra, tumacēṃ khoklyāchēṃ sārūpa "4 ghāṭikāṃ sātīra 5 mL gheũ" mhūṇ sāṃgyāvēṃ. kēdyākāra tūmē cc's pannī paũḷē, tēṃ mL jāgaṃ asa. injekṣana saṃbhaṇāṃsa mL pannī jaṭalīṃ jatat.
normalised:
Konkani translation:

Konkani translation:
Konnenken mhaka vokhdamam vaportat te measurement units kite mhunn vicharlem, mhunn hanvem kaim common udahornam vanttunk sochlem. Tem ekdum veg-vegllem field asa! Liquid vokhdamank, vostu zaitich pavtim milliliter-an mezta. Udahornnak, tumchem kankachem syrupacher “dor char voramni panch milliliter gheiat” mhunn sangonk xakta. Kednam kednam tumi c c-ui polloat, zachem milliliter-achem sarkech asta. Injections-ui zaitich pavtim milliliter-an mezta.
text: mhojekoṇāṇī vaidyakīyavṛttīntūṇ vapṭelīṃ māpanācīṃ ēkamakāṃīṃ kasalīṃ mhūṇ prasna kelo, mhūṇ hañva kaim̃ saṃmānnya udaharaṇāṃīṃ vāṭṭīṃ gēlo mhūṇ bhāvelāṃ. tēṃ ēkaṃ khūba vegavēgīḷa ksētra asa! dhrava aurṣadhāṃsātīra, vastū āpōpa mL (millilitara) mēḷa vapṭelīṃ jatat. udāharaṇāra, tumacēṃ khoklyāchēṃ sārūpa "4 ghāṭikāṃ sātīra 5 mL gheũ" mhūṇ sāṃgyāvēṃ. kēdyākāra tūmē cc's pannī paũḷē, tēṃ mL jāgaṃ asa. injekṣana saṃbhaṇāṃsa mL pannī jaṭalīṃ jatat.

unnormalised: ghana medikanam khatir, tumkam sadharanopon mg (milligram) vo g (gram) mhunn mellttat. paracetamola sarkem ek sadharan dukhi nivaarachem vokhodd 500 mg tabletant ieta. kain vitaminam mcg (microgram) ant mezunk yetat, jem milligram porosui lhan asta – 1000 mcg mhunnge 1 mg. ani kednam kednam tumkam vostu units ant mezleleo distat, khas korun insulin khatir (zoxem, 10 units insulin).
normalised: ghatt vokhdham khatir, tumkam sadharanpanan milligram va graman vostu mellttat. Paracetamol sarkhem ek sadharan dukhi nashok panchshe milligramachea tabletant yeta. kaim vitaminam micrograman mezpant yetat, jem milligram porosui lhan asa – ek hojar microgram mhunnttlear ek milligram. ani kednaim tumkam vostu unitant mezl'leo distat, khas korun insulinakhatir (zoxem, insulinache dha unit).
text: ghana medikanam khatir, tumkam sadharanopon mg (milligram) vo g (gram) mhunn mellttat. paracetamola sarkem ek sadharan dukhi nivaarachem vokhodd 500 mg tabletant ieta. kain vitaminam mcg (microgram) ant mezunk yetat, jem milligram porosui lhan asta – 1000 mcg mhunnge 1 mg. ani kednam kednam tumkam vostu units ant mezleleo distat, khas korun insulin khatir (zoxem, 10 units insulin).

unnormalised: rogtachea dabavixim ulop kortana, ami sadharonponnanim mmHg (mercuryachea millimeter) vaportat. sadharon rogtacho dabav 120/80 mmHg aasu-aasun asta. xorirachem tapman zaitim vella degrees Celsius (°C) vo Fahrenheit (°F) hantun sangtat - Bharotant, °C sadharonponnanim vaportat. sadharon xorirachem tapman 37°C aasu-aasun asta. ani oxygen-achem satvas xodtalear, tumkam eak percentage (%) distolem. ek borea aslelea SpO2-chi pattli 95%-chea voir asonk zai.
normalised: rogtachaap vishayim uloitaana, aami sadharanoponnan milimeetar of markyuri vapartat. sadharan rogtachaap ek shem vis slash einshi milimeetar of markyuri aspaak zai. shorirachem tapman chodd korun digree selsiyos vo farenheittant sangtat - bhartant, digree selsiyos sadharanoponnan vapartat. ek sadharan shorirachem tapman sumar teintis digree selsiyos aspaak zai. ani oksijen sechyureshon tanktaana, tumkam ek tokdo distolo. ek bori es pee o don level navvad ponch tokdyache voir asunk zai.
text: rogtachapavishim ul'lekh kortana, ami samanyan (millimeters of mercury) vapurtat. samanya rogtachap lagimlagim 120/80 mmHg asta. shorirachem tapman chodd korun degree celsius vo fahrenheit-ant dakhoitat - bhartant, °C sadharan vapartat. samanya shorirachem tap lagimlagim 37°C asta. ani oxygen saturation tanktat tedna, tumkam percentage dista ek bore spo2 level 95% voir asunk zai.

unnormalised: Nimannem, unchai ani vajanacho vichar korat. Rogyanche unchai sadharanoponnam cm (centimeter) vo ft & inch-ant nond kortat. Konn 175 cm unch vo 5 ft 9 inch asunk xakta. Vajan samanyoponnam kg (kilogram)ant maptat. Eka bhurgeak survaatek gram (g)ant vollyet. Zaiti veg-veglim unitam asat, ani tem khorench kashachem map kortalem tancher adharit asta!
normalised: अखेरीक, उंचाय आनी वजन हांचे विशीं विचार करात. दुयेंत मनशांची उंचाय चड करून सेंटिमीटर वा फूट आनी इंचांनी नोंद करतात. कोण तरी एकशें सत्तर सेंटिमीटर उंच वा पांच फूट नऊ इंच उंच आसूं येता. वजन सामान्यपणान किलोग्रामान मोजतात. भुरग्याचें वजन सुरवेक ग्रामांनी करूं येता. खूब तरांचीं युनिटां आसात, आनी तें खऱ्या अर्थान कशाचें मापन करतात हाचेचेर आदारून आसा!
text: Nimannem, unchai ani vaznacher vichar korat. Rogianchi unchai sadharanponnan cm (centimeteram) vo ft & inchanim nond kortat. Konn 175 cm unch vo 5 ft 9 inches astalo. Vazn samanyatayen kg (kilogramam) nim meztat. Eklea bhurgeak survatek gramanim vozon korunk xakta. Thoddim veglleant vegllim unitam asat, ani tem khorench kitem meztat tache voir adharun asta!
